case.title: Italian moving to London - 40 (Rome-London)
case.text:
Hi there! I am an Italian female from Rome Italy who decided to move to London. About me... I am attractive, smart, well travelled, well educated, great sense of humor, artistic, love cooking and wine... and all the other plesures in life. :) I work in the fashion business. I spent a few years in L.A., then came back to Rome but I guess I am not fullfilled. I am making arrangements for housing and jobs... it would just be so nice to know somebody there.... I don't know anyone in London. I'll be happy if you reply with a pic a something about yourself... your pic gets mine!
Have a rocking day!
